JobTitle: Oil, Gas, & Chemicals - SAP Manager - (FICO /EAM / EPPM / PS/ IS-OIL/JVA) - NC
JobFullDesc: Oil, Gas, & Chemicals - SAP Manager - (FICO/EAM/EPPM/PS/IS-OIL/JVA) Are you an SAP professional experienced with clients in Oil, Gas & Chemicals sector? Our practice is undergoing heavy growth and high demand for SAP talent, while giving our talent the chance to work with world-class organizations solving key business issues in a team environment.  Work you'll do  Deliver OG&C (Oil, Gas, & Chemicals) SAP projects   Lead and support SAP pursuits and OG&C practice development initiatives   Promote and participate in forums for sharing SAP and OG&C expertise, strengthening Deloitte's collective knowledge and helping resolve our clients' challenges   Collaborate on innovative solutions to support the future of SAP and OG&C   Develop your knowledge of and gain project experience in SAP's new S/4HANA and future solutions  Required Qualifications  Bachelor's degree   Must have Oil, Gas and Chemicals experience   Functional/technical proficiency with at least 4+ full life-cycle SAP implementations and 8+ years of industry and/or consulting experience   At least 8 years of SAP experience implementing SAP. Applications include SAP S/4HANA and Cloud (Hybris, Ariba, IBP, SuccessFactors, and SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud)   Must have expert level experience in one of the following modules: FICO, EAM, EPPM, PS and/or IS-OIL   Team lead or Project Manager on at least 3+ full cycle implementations   Limited immigration sponsorship may be available.   Ability to travel 80-100% (While 80-100% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice.)  Preferred  Master's degree preferred   Experience defining systems strategy, developing systems requirements, designing and prototyping, testing, training, defining support procedures and implementing practical business solutions under multiple deadlines   Adept at designing and implementing technology-enabled business solutions for clients as part of a high-talent.   Strong current hands-on configuration and design skills   The team  Our SAP consulting team helps clients modernize their core systems, building an agile architecture, powering the digital enterprise and enabling innovation for our clients. Serving over 75% of Oil, Gas and Chemical Fortune 500 companies allows for the development of industry-specific technical expertise and working side-by-side with client staff provides a transfer of industry knowledge.
